title: Goodbye, SOFIA, the Telescope That Actually Flew

media:group.media:title: Goodbye, SOFIA, the Telescope That Actually Flew
media:group.media:description:
In 1997, NASA bought a Boeing 747SP for what might be both a super cool and super absurd purpose. Turn it into SOFIA, a flying telescope.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)
----------
Huge thanks go to the following Patreon supporter for helping us keep SciShow Space free for everyone forever: Jason A Saslow, David Brooks, and AndyGneiss!
